defender.label: Defender
defender.description: Get notified on unusual activity on your account
defender.longDescription: This module is the replacement for HyGuard. It features most of the same checks, although it has been slightly simplified for a better user experience.

friend.label: Friend Notifier
friend.description: Get notified whenever a friend logs on or out
friend.longDescription: This module will send you a notification when your friends log on or out. This can be sent in a channel or DM'd. You can only get notifications for people who have approved you on this bot for privacy reasons.

daily.label: Daily Rewards
daily.description: Get notified whenever you are about to miss your daily reward
daily.longDescription: This module will send you a DM whenever you are about to miss your daily reward. You can customize the threshold and the alert intervals.
